overview: Hungarian-Australian immigrant Gergely leaves behind his alcoholic father to enlist in the Vietnam War. On arrival, he is greeted by a friendly Private Carlile and a hostile Private Finch, before they are joined by a disorientated Sergeant Donaldson, who warns them of an impending ambush. Having taken antimalarials, they retreat but soon find themselves lost in the jungle, where they succumb to the drugsâ€™ side effects.
title: These Men Did
